  • home
  • INC'D
    Click to see site

    A notetaking app for entrepreneurs.

    Built using Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, Javascript, JQuery, AJAX, HTML, CSS, Slim.
  • TICKETY TACKETY
    Click to see site

    Tic tac toe with computer and online multiplayer functionality.

    Built using AngularJS, Yeoman, Firebase, JQuery, Javascript, HTML, CSS.
  • DISH!
    Click to see GitHub repo

    A dish recommendation website for Hong Kong. Admins can add restaurants through FourSquare.

    Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, RABL, Handlebars, JQuery, CoffeeScript, HTML, CSS, Slim, JSON, OAuth, LeafletJS.
  • FRESH HIKES FINDER
    Click to see GitHub repo

    Prototyped at the Open Data Hackathon from Jan 25-26 in a team of 2. Scrapes the air pollution index hourly combined with hiking data to look for the "healthiest" hiking routes in Hong Kong. Candidate for the GovHK Data.One app competition.

    Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, JQuery, Javascript, RSpec, Mechanize, CronJob
  • MEATY CHRISTMAS CALENDAR
    Click to see site

    An advent calendar for people who prefer meat over chocolate.

    Built using Javascript, HTML, CSS, rapidly deployed on Heroku using Ruby and Rack.
  • HONG KONG HACKNIGHTS
    Click to see site

    Landing page for HK HK - an excuse for developers to get together twice a month to code. Co-founder. Subscribe to our newsletter soon.

    Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS.
